Outdoor.description: Become a survival expert with the same surival manual used and trusted by the US Military.
Stay warm and dry out in the field with this 3-in-1 survival blanket. Can be used as a sleeping bag, poncho, and blanket.
Stay hidden from your enemies and blend in to your environment with this US Army Camo Face Paint.
Features include LED light, signal mirror, thermometer, compass, magnifying glass, and whistle.
When surviving in the wild, a fire is a necessity. Come rain or shine, these matches can be trusted to ignite and get your fire started.

Clothing.description: Dress like a soldier with these Army-issued BDU style pants
Complete your Army unform with this Army-issued BDU camo Top
Lightweight, breathable, and highly wicking, this Army Combat Shirt will keep you cool in the hottest environments

Patches.description: Going on deployment and need to stock up on the Subdued Flag? Order some today
Display your patriotism with the US Army of One shoulder sleeve insignia
All the Way! This shoulder sleeve insignia is worn by the 82nd Airborne Division

Tactical.product: ACU Digital Camo Lightweight Tactical Assault Vest
Tactical.description: This Lightweight Tactical Assault Vest has 8 pockets for storage so you can stay in the fight

Tactical.product: Condor Viper Single Point Bungee Sling
Tactical.description: Stay comfortable and tactical when carrying your rifle with this easy-to-adjust single point sling

Tactical.product: Anti-Fog Shatterproof Tactical Enhanced CE Goggles
Tactical.description: The Tactical Goggles have been designed to provide you with a comfortable yet protected barrier between your eyes and the elements
